actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to extend the milk diversion program and to remove the authority of the Secretary of Agriculture to modify the price support rate for milk.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to repeal existing authority for April 1985 and July 1985 milk price support reductions. Establishes a 12-month paid milk diversion program (April 1, 1985, through March 31, 1986) available to all dairy producers.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to extend the milk diversion program and to remove the authority of the Secretary of Agriculture to modify the price support rate for milk.
